article_headline: Artists decry removal of nude art sculpture
article_text: LOS ANGELES (AP) — The removal from a federal building of a nude sculpture, criticized as a “shrine to pedophiles,” has drawn charges of censorship from members of the art community and the sculptor himself. The General Services Administration placed the sculpture of a nude woman and a baby gjrl in storage after Rep. Edward R. Roybal, D-Calif., whom the building will be named after, criticized the artwork by
